label: lem-empirical-moments-lipschitz
name: Empirical moments are Lipschitz in L2
relations_established: Empirical second moment is Lipschitz: L_{m2,M} = 2V_max/sqrt(k)
natural_language_statement: Let v ‚àà ‚Ñù^k collect the values of the k=|ùíú(ùíÆ)| alive walkers. Consider the empirical mean and second raw moment. Assume |v_i| ‚â§ V_max for all i. Then, with respect to the L2 norm on ‚Ñù^k, the mean and second moment are Lipschitz continuous.
full_statement_text: Let v ‚àà ‚Ñù^k collect the values of the k=|ùíú(ùíÆ)| alive walkers. Consider the empirical mean and second raw moment. Assume |v_i| ‚â§ V_max for all i. Then, with respect to the L2 norm on ‚Ñù^k, the mean and second moment are Lipschitz continuous.
